name: nitsan/ns-all-sliders
description: One of the only TYPO3 extension which provides to use most popular jQuery slider plugins at your website. This TYPO3 extension provides to configure sliders eg., nivo-slider, royal-slider, owlcarousel, sliderjs-slider etc. You can download PRO version for more-features & free-support at https://t3terminal.com/all-in-one-slider-pro/
